item.title: By: QforQ
item.dc:creator: QforQ
item.description: Curse is only reacting to Affinity Media/IGE/Allakhazam. They have no vision or foresight and I doubt they will be much more than they are now, which isn't much. They are behind the curve and trying to catch up by throwing the Curse owner's dads money at the problem. This isnt VC money, this is his family's investment money.
item.content:encoded: Curse is only reacting to Affinity Media/IGE/Allakhazam. They have no vision or foresight and I doubt they will be much more than they are now, which isn’t much. They are behind the curve and trying to catch up by throwing the Curse owner’s dads money at the problem. This isnt VC money, this is his family’s investment money.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Agree, the ACE stable of addons is superb.
item.content:encoded: Agree, the ACE stable of addons is superb.

item.title: By: Gheist
item.dc:creator: Gheist
item.description:
Their news is written by 12 year olds and frequently outdated and sometimes just plain wrong, and usually I can pick it up quicker from other sources just by having my own RSS reader (which is probably what they do anyway). There are better places to pick up mods these days (ACE svn anyone? :P), and allot of the mods listed are hardly updated now, due to other sites being more popular.
Don't see how they are going ot make back that sort of cash unless they start charging to download other peoples work and have access to their crappy news.
item.content:encoded:
Their news is written by 12 year olds and frequently outdated and sometimes just plain wrong, and usually I can pick it up quicker from other sources just by having my own RSS reader (which is probably what they do anyway). There are better places to pick up mods these days (ACE svn anyone? :P), and allot of the mods listed are hardly updated now, due to other sites being more popular.

Don’t see how they are going ot make back that sort of cash unless they start charging to download other peoples work and have access to their crappy news.

item.title: By: Zygwen
item.dc:creator: Zygwen
item.description: I think there is a key flaw in their plan, their name is cursed. Well, that and I can't load their site on this browser.
item.content:encoded: I think there is a key flaw in their plan, their name is cursed. Well, that and I can’t load their site on this browser.

item.title: By: DGM
item.dc:creator: DGM
item.description: Their linking to actual items from plans in the wow portal does not work, tsk tsk Curse.
item.content:encoded: Their linking to actual items from plans in the wow portal does not work, tsk tsk Curse.

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: Noticed the change yesterday when I went to see about some updates to my addons....*drool* indeed
item.content:encoded: Noticed the change yesterday when I went to see about some updates to my addons….*drool* indeed

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description:
*drools*
Darn it, I really need to focus on reading review books today, and now I have a feeling I'll spend entirely too much time over at curse. Sigh...
item.content:encoded:
*drools*

Darn it, I really need to focus on reading review books today, and now I have a feeling I’ll spend entirely too much time over at curse. Sigh…
